Title: Establishes the homeownership protection program
Summary: Establishes the homeowner protection program; provides that the department of law shall establish the homeowner protection program to ensure the availability of free housing counseling and legal services to homeowners for the purposes of mitigating threats to homeownership; provides that the department of law shall provide grants to eligible not-for-profit housing counseling organizations and legal services organizations to provide services under the program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to establishing the homeowner protection program
